span.span: Discards all changes in the edited cells of the range.

span.span: For a range based on an OLAP data source, this method removes all values and formulas entered in the cells, and then runs an update operation to retrieve the latest values from the data source.

para.span: 数据源值设置为空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) 的所有值单元格的编辑，且还执行针对 OLAP 服务器的回滚事务语句。

span.span: It sets the data source value to a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) for all value cells that are edited, and also executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP server.

para.span: 为基于非 OLAP 数据源的范围，此方法只需清除所有已编辑单元格。

span.span: For ranges based on non-OLAP data sources, this method simply clears all edited cells.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Formula { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置 A1 样式表示法和宏语言中的对象的公式。

span.span: Returns or sets the object's formula in A1-style notation and in the language of the macro.

para.span: 此属性对于 OLAP 数据源无效。

span.span: This property is not available for OLAP data sources.

para.span: 如果单元格包含一个常量，此属性返回该常量。如果单元格为空，此 Formula 属性返回一个空字符串。如果单元格包含公式，Formula 属性将该公式作为字符串返回，所用格式与在编辑栏（包括等号）中显示时的格式相同。

span.span: If the cell contains a constant, this property returns the constant. If the cell is empty, this Formula property returns an empty string. If the cell contains a formula, the Formula property returns the formula as a string in the same format that would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).

para.span: 如果将单元格的值或者公式设置为日期类型，则 Microsoft Excel 将检查此单元格的数字格式是否符合日期或者时间格式。如果不符合，Microsoft Excel 将把数字格式设置为默认的短日期格式。

span.span: If you set the value or formula of a cell to a date, Microsoft Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats. If not, Microsoft Excel changes the number format to the default short date number format.

para.span: 如果该区域是一个-或两维范围时，您可以设置为相同尺寸的数组的公式。

span.span: If the range is a one- or two-dimensional range, you can set the formula to an array of the same dimensions.

para.span: 同样，您可以将公式放到基本的数组。

span.span: Similarly, you can put the formula into a Basic array.

para.span: 如果为多单元格区域设置公式，则会用公式填充该区域所有的单元格。

span.span: Setting the formula for a multiple-cell range fills all cells in the range with the formula.

param.name: ParseLine

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 一个字符串，包含可指示应在何处拆分单元格的左边框和右括号。例如，"[xxx] [xxx]"将插入到目标区域，第一列的前三个字符，它会在第二列中插入三个字符。如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Excel 将猜测拆分基于左上角单元格区域中的间距的列的位置。

span.span: A string that contains left and right brackets to indicate where the cells should be split.For example, "[xxx][xxx]" would insert the first three characters into the first column of the destination range, and it would insert the next three characters into the second column.If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Excel guesses where to split the columns based on the spacing of the top left cell in the range.

param.span: 如果您想要使用不同的范围猜测分析行，使用范围对象为参数。

span.span: If you want to use a different range to guess the parse line, use a Range object as the argument.

param.span: 该范围必须对要分析的单元格之一。

span.span: That range must be one of the cells that's being parsed.

param.span: 参数不能超过 255 个字符，包括括号和空格。

span.span: The argument cannot be longer than 255 characters, including the brackets and spaces.

param.name: Destination

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: A对象，表示已分析的数据的目标区域的左上角。

span.span: A object that represents the upper-left corner of the destination range for the parsed data.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Excel 将分析就地。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Excel parses in place.

summary.span: 分析的数据范围，并将其分为多个单元格。

span.span: Parses a range of data and breaks it into multiple cells.

para.span: 分发要填充相邻的多个列的范围的内容。

span.span: Distributes the contents of the range to fill several adjacent columns.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range Range[object Cell1, object Cell2] { get; }

public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::Range ^ Range[System::Object ^, System::Object ^] { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::Range ^ get(System::Object ^ Cell1, System::Object ^ Cell2); };

param.name: Cell1

span.span: Required Object.
The name of the range.

param.span: 这必须是在宏语言中 A1 样式的引用。

span.span: This must be an A1-style reference in the language of the macro.

param.span: 它可以包括区域运算符 （冒号）、 交点运算符 （空格） 或 union 运算符 （逗号分隔）。

span.span: It can include the range operator (a colon), the intersection operator (a space), or the union operator (a comma).

param.span: 它还可以包含美元符号，但它们被忽略。

span.span: It can also include dollar signs, but they’re ignored.

param.span: 您可以使用局部定义的名称在该范围的任何部分。

span.span: You can use a local defined name in any part of the range.

param.span: 如果您使用的名称，被假定该名称为宏的语言。

span.span: If you use a name, the name is assumed to be in the language of the macro.

param.name: Cell2

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 区域左上角和右下角中的单元格。

span.span: The cell in the upper-left and lower-right corner of the range.

param.span: 可以是一个Range对象，该对象包含单个单元格、 整列或整行，也可以是命名的宏语言中的单个单元格的字符串。

span.span: Can be a Range object that contains a single cell, an entire column, or entire row, or it can be a string that names a single cell in the language of the macro.

summary.span: 返回对象，它代表单元格区域。

span.span: Returns a object that represents a cell or a range of cells.

para.span: 此属性是相对于Range对象。

span.span: This property is relative to the Range object.

para.span: 例如，如果所选内容位于单元格 C3，然后 Selection.Range("B1") 返回单元格 D3 因为它是相对于Range对象返回属性。

span.span: For example, if the selection is cell C3, then Selection.Range("B1") returns cell D3 because it’s relative to the Range object returned by the property.

para.span: 另一方面，ActiveSheet.Range("B1") 始终返回单元格 B1。

span.span: On the other hand, ActiveSheet.Range("B1") always returns cell B1.

param.span: 如果Range对象包含多个单元格，则返回的值 （使用IsArray函数测试这种情况） 的数组。xlRangeValueMSPersistXML 以 XML 格式返回指定的Range对象的记录集表示形式。xlRangeValueXMLSpreadsheet 返回值、 格式、 公式和 XML 电子表格格式指定的Range对象的名称。

span.span: If the Range object contains more than one cell, returns an array of values (use the IsArray function to test for this case).xlRangeValueMSPersistXML Returns the recordset representation of the specified Range object in an XML format.xlRangeValueXMLSpreadsheet Returns the values, formatting, formulas, and names of the specified Range object in the XML Spreadsheet format.

summary.span: 返回或设置指定范围的值。

span.span: Returns or sets the value of the specified range.

para.span: 设置单元格区域的 XML 电子表格文件内容时, 使用仅工作簿中的第一个工作表的值。

span.span: When setting a range of cells with the contents of an XML spreadsheet file, only values of the first sheet in the workbook are used.

para.span: 您无法设置或获取非连续范围中的 XML 电子表格格式的单元格。

span.span: You cannot set or get a noncontiguous range of cells in the XML spreadsheet format.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Value2 { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置单元格的值。

span.span: Returns or sets the cell value.

para.span: 该属性与 Value 属性的唯一区别是：Value2 属性不使用 Currency 和 Date 数据类型。可以通过使用 Double 数据类型，以浮点数形式返回这些数据类型格式的数值。

span.span: The only difference between this property and the Value property is that the Value2 property doesn’t use the Currency and Date data types. You can return values formatted with these data types as floating-point numbers by using the Double data type.

span.span: The width, in points, of the range.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Worksheet As Worksheet

span.span: Returns a object that represents the worksheet containing the specified range.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ WrapText { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 确定是否 Microsoft Excel 会将文本包装对象中。

span.span: Determines if Microsoft Excel wraps the text in the object.

para.span: 如果 Microsoft Excel 中的对象和Null文字环绕，如果指定的区域中包含一些单元格文本换行的和不其他单元格，则此属性返回True 。

span.span: This property returns True if Microsoft Excel wraps the text in the object and Null if the specified range contains some cells that wrap text and other cells that don’t.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 会在必要的时候改变区域的行高以容纳其中的文字。

span.span: Microsoft Excel will change the row height of the range, if necessary, to accommodate the text in the range.

para.span: 仅在 Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 和 Microsoft Office Excel 2003 中提供了 XML 功能，除了 XML 电子表格格式保存文件。

span.span: XML features, except for saving files in the XML Spreadsheet format, are available only in Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 and Microsoft Office Excel 2003.
